title: Gelato Vero vintage cursive font
content:
Please identify this vintage cursive font.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100609055024im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_5900.jpg)

need to recreate the gelato vero text
author: shoegaze

comments.content: It looks custom made to me...

I gather the second one is a re-drawing and not the original.

Nicolai may be correct, that originally someone drew this up as a logo and it may not be from a font.

If you are now in that same process there are a few that may help you capture the "feeling." Among them would be Saginaw (Treacyface) to capture the "V" --

Fontella - for the same "feel" (not the same, but similar) or even a Gilliess Gothic Sans

What ever it was, it looked like it was influenced by Kaufman (Swing) Script.

Hope that helps in some way...
